  • @author Christopher

  • @date 05/11/2010

  • @version 1.0
    */
    public class MathsOps {
    public double num1;
    public double num2;

    num1 = a;
    num2 = b;
    numOfMathsOps ++;
    }

      System.out.println(num1);
      }

      num1 = num1/10;
      }
      /      *

      /
      void changeDivNum2() {
      num2 = num2/10;
      }
      /      *

    • @return A double data type.
      /
      double getNum1PlusNum2() {
      return num1 + num2;

      /      *

      /

      return x + num1;
      }
      /      *

    • @param double x
    • @return A double data type.
      */
      double getxSubFromNum2(double x) {
      return num2 - x;
      }

    public void addToNum1(double x) {
    System.out.println("num1 is now equal to " + x+num1);

    }
    }
